name: Untitled Line Game
description:
Tutorial

Controls:
-WSAD, move
-Space, skip turn

Mechanics:
-The aim of the game is to last as long as possible while trying to enclose as many enemies as possible
-Walking into enemies or red squares will take away one life
-You can occupy the spaces of enemies that are about to move
-Erasers will sometimes spawn and remove any lines you draw
-enclosing erasers will give you one more life
